DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to assess the safety and tolerability of AZD1446 following single dose administration.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Assess Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics After Single Doses of AZD1446 to Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: physical healthy volunteers weight between 50 to 100 kg and a body mass index (BMI) between 19 and 30 kg/m2 History of any clinically significant disease or disorder. History of severe allergy/hypersensitivity reactions
